row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
col_desc: Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has at least two lip sync wins.
Queen has two lip sync wins.
